items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Modest Wedding Guest Dress
items.body: Just received this dress and it’s beautiful! I am 21 weeks pregnant and was looking for a modest dress for a winter wedding hubby and I are attending and this was perfect. I ordered size S and was concerned about it fitting but was pleasantly surprised. It fits like a glove and is very soft too. It’s not tight at all or measures weird in certain places. It has a very classic and timeless look to it. Excited to wear it! Read more
items.author: Lovlee Monica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved the color and fit
items.body: Very becoming and lay so nicely. It is not too tight, but still so feminine and complimentary. The back has a large key hole (which i had a tailor close with a zipper.) Also, make sure to steam it before wearing as it wrinkles easily. It did need a slip underneath due to static. Read more
items.author: Rochel Litzman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best dresses I've ever purchased!
items.body: Such a beautiful classy dress and to me it was very inexpensive! I used a black belt and a black shoes. I'm 5 ft and 135 lb. I live in Florida so the material was perfect, not too heavy. Not too light at all. Not see-through. Comfortable. Length was perfect for church conference. And I am obsessed with this color! Read more
items.author: Tamara Bolinger

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Brown maxi dress
items.body: This is a great dress. Good material. It’s silky and lightweight but not see through. I got an XLarge. I’m about 145lbs. It fits perfectly however it was a bit longer than I wanted it to be but it’s still a great length. The color was beautiful just as pictured. The price was great. Read more
items.author: Radika V.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, comfortable dress
items.body: I should have trusted and got my size as a large but it was still beautiful and comfortable. Perfect for a gala. I have big arms and butt and it fit nicely. Read more
items.author: Jackie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dress
items.body: I bought this in a medium and small- both fit well, but medium had more room across the shoulders and chest. Photo is of the medium. Item needed a lot of steaming, but worth it. I kept both sizes. I received a lot of compliments, and felt very comfortable in it. I am 5’3, 120lbs. Read more
items.author: Kirby

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color of fabric is uneven or stained.
items.body: Dress is gorgeous, was saving for holidays, showing the dress to my daughter I realized the dress has stains on it or the dye created a spot. I am past the return date. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and comfortable
items.body: Such a classy dress! I more it to a winter wedding. It was very flattering and I will wear it again and again! The fabric is a good quality and weight. It was very comfortable! 5’6” 150 lbs. Read more
items.author: Cassie Cline

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve Formal Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brilliant Blue, Deep Red, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Navy, Khaki, Tender Green, Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
